n: Peanut Butter, Mayonnaise, and Lettuce Sandwich
des: "So good, but I admit it sounds disgusting.  Everyone I have ever gotten to try this sandwich ends up loving it."
ins: Spread one slice of bread with mayonnaise. Spread the other slice with peanut butter. Place lettuce leaves on top of the peanut butter, then top with the mayonnaise-side of the other piece of bread to make a sandwich.
